text:
Cabify | Software Engineers| Madrid,Spain | REMOTE & ONSITE | VISA

We have just been recognised as one of Europe's fastest growing private company and we're looking to keep growing with the help of some great mid-senior level people with previous experience working with either Go, Elixir or Ruby, however if not we are still happy to consider your application. For us it is more important to have team members who are adaptable and can help us solve problems that have not been solved before.

Join us now and be part of revolutionising urban mobility!

Apply here: https://cabify.workable.com/jobs/

If you want to ask us any questions before you apply to make sure this is the company for you please contact talent@cabify.com
